info.name: Postman Practice [Marianna Matola]
info.description:
!!! Important !!!

- All tests are written that way: **if the status code test fails**, then **all other tests** (which fail too) **are not displayed**  
    **for example:** 'Sign up with a username with 41 symbols' - we receive a 200 status code instead of 422 so there is no need to run tests checking if the validation message is correct, so **these tests are written in an 'if' statement checking status code.**
